title: Font used on a restaurant logo - help!?
content:
trying to redraw this for a customer but cant for the life of me work out the fonts used here

any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113729im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Mehfil%20%20logo_6509.png)
author: waynep16

comments.content:
Hello  
I think is Ageone bold  
Alex

WOW, other than the thinner F and the slanted L at the top, yes you're spot on!  
I can make those changers in illustrator easily enough.

Any guesses on the slogan ?

Many thanks
